page.title: 13OUR COMMUNITY POLICEMAN
page.content:
We interviewed our{Community Police {man,}P.C Wedge. We found out that he gets two to three calls a day and has worked as a policeman for seven years.
{The Police Station in Bridport}is forty-four years old. There are twenty eight police men working at the Police Station. Quite recently P.C Wedge has dealt with a{burglary}of Â£2,600 worth of silver.
There are no dogs at the Bridport Station, but there are five dogs in the Western County. The funniest case he has dealt with is when he caught a missing dog and put it in the car. Before he had time to take the dog to the station,it jumped out of the window!!
